remarks: Distribute proper substitution through the conditional operator. (Contributed by NM, 24-Feb-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2016.)  Obsolete as of 19-Aug-2018.  Use ~ csbif instead. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement: csbifgOLD $p |- ( A e. V -> [_ A / x ]_ if ( ph , B , C ) = if ( [. A / x ]. ph , [_ A / x ]_ B , [_ A / x ]_ C ) ) $.
